review: Easy to install.  Works great.  Costs much less than my last streaming device.  Love it.
author: Weda Boolos

review: I like my Fire Stick, it's very easy to set up and the interface is very cool, am always on it, so it get a 4/5 to me the only reason why it did not get 5 stars is cuz I have to set up my Netflix twice
author: Michael Estera

review: Love it! Had more then we expected. The remote is small, so it's been lost and found several times already. However, the phone app is awesome as a remote replacement!
author: Amanda Howe

review: Not good at streaming movies like in Netflix
author: Jamie Suarez

review: OMG- I LOVE this amazing way to watch shows.  I held out, not getting cable, and knew I was missing out on shows that everyone was talking about.  With this Fire TV Stick, now I can watch Amazon Prime shows, and my son set me up so I can watch Netflix and Hoo-loo, too!  Perfect tool for me!
author: qwiltz

review: Very easy set up, awesome remote control and great performance!
author: Jim Lollar

review: Product is great. Can't wait for HBO Go app and would love to see Starz app as well.
author: Ellis Geer
